text: tatha tumhen kuchh aise doosare log bhee milenge, jo tumhaaree or se bhee shaant rahana chaahate hain aur apanee jaati kee or se shaant rahana (chaahate hain). phir jab bhee upadrav kee or pher diye jaayen, to usamen ondhe hokar gir jaate hain. to yadi ve tumase vilag na rahen aur tumase sandhi na karen tatha apana haath na roken, to unhen pakado aur jahaan pao, vadh karo. hamane unake virudhd tumhaare lie khula tark bana diya hai
